about_the_game:
Demo Content Overview:

This demo allows you to experience the core gameplay that Battle Shapers has to offer. It takes about 30 minutes to complete, but even after you finish, you can continue enjoying additional runs to unlock extra weapons, abilities, and augment your talents.

You will have access to a subset of the game’s full arsenal of weapons and abilities, along with unlockable talents and gear modifiers that reflect early to mid-level progression. Two of the game’s Shaper Cores — the Adamant Core and the Strike Core — are fully unlocked for you to try, along with a partially unlocked Wind Core to experiment with different builds.

The complete range of Battle Shapers gameplay content—including weapons, talents, Shaper Cores, enhancements, environments, optional challenges, enemies, and bosses—as well as the game’s full story progression and additional special mechanics and features, will be accessible in the full game.

Full Game Introduction:

You play as Ada, a reactivated Shaper tasked with reclaiming New Elysium from the cunning Overlords and their corrupted robots. Using advanced weapons and unique abilities, you will shoot & smash your way through dangerous towers and defeat the Overlords to put an end to their corruption of the city.

  • Gun down hordes of enemy machines with relentless and punishing close-range combat in which every bot destroyed makes you stronger.

  • Face the Overlords and adapt to their evolving powers and tactics by mastering highly customizable weapons, movement, and combat abilities.

  • Steal the Overlords’ Cores and harness their powers to craft and transform both your playstyle and appearance.

  • Unlock new weapons, abilities and talents to permanently increase your survivability and maximize your combat potential with every run.

  • Deploy your own traps, power-ups and hacks in each Overlord’s tower to turn the tides of battle in your favor.

  • Explore vibrant nostalgia-inspired locations to discover hidden upgrades and weapons throughout.

  • Be warned! Just as you grow stronger by defeating Overlords, the journey ahead will also become more challenging.

  • Defy the Overlords and save the city to the might of adrenaline-pumping rock music that will have you diving head-on and fist-first into action.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit Version)
  • Processor: i5 4th Gen 4 Cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended. 50 FPS in 1920x1080 with "Very Low" preset.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit Version)
  • Processor: i7 7700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended. 60 FPS in 1920x1080 with "Very High" preset.

short_description: Shoot and smash your way through hordes of enemy bots in this action-packed FPS roguelite. Customize powerful weapons and hone your abilities to liberate your city from the grips of a mysterious evil. Will you defeat the Volt Colossus and use his powers to defy the other Overlords?
